title: Simulate Impact of New Development Using Digital Twin
description: A developer has proposed a new high-rise building. A city planner uses the digital twin to assess its impact on traffic and solar access.

tasks.description: Load the proposed building's 3D model into the city's digital twin at the specified location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully imports the new building model.

tasks.description: Run a traffic simulation to model the impact of the new residents and office workers on the surrounding streets.
tasks.expected_outcome: The simulation shows a 20% increase in congestion on an adjacent street.

tasks.description: Run a shadow analysis to determine the building's impact on sunlight for a nearby public park.
tasks.expected_outcome: The simulation shows the park will be in shadow for an additional 2 hours per day.

tasks.description: Generate a report with the simulation results to be included in the planning review.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a summary report with key findings and visualizations.
